A '''tortured slave''' is a minor character in the [[Season 3|third season]] played by guest star [[Mark Drake]] who debuts in "[[Walk of Punishment]]."
sections.Biography:
===[[Season 3]]===
He is a [[Slavery|slave]] who presumably showed insubordination of some kind to his [[Good Masters|masters]], and after being viciously whipped is strapped to a cross and left to die out in public on the [[Walk of Punishment (Astapor)|Walk of Punishment]], as a warning to all other slaves. [[Daenerys Targaryen]] offers the man water, and he refuses to drink, saying that he just wanted to die quickly as drinking the water would only prolong his suffering.<ref>"[[Walk of Punishment]]"</ref>
